City Gate.description: The massive gate guards the city from outside threats.

Marketplace.description: A bustling market full of merchants and townsfolk.

Tavern.description: A warm place filled with chatter, ale, and rumours.

Square.description: The city square where people gather for announcements.

Temple.description: A peaceful sanctuary for the faithful.

Barracks.description: The guards and city militia train and rest here.

Docks.description: Boats load and unload by the riverbanks.

Warehouse.description: Storage for merchant goods and supplies.

Forest Edge.description: The wilds begin here, where the city ends.
